string.name: changelog_master
string.Data:
Nightly build:

Android 11 notice:

Android 11 enforces a new way for storing data, which c:geo does not support yet. If you switch your system to Android 11, c:geo will not be able to access part of its data. This will most likely disable storing offline maps, importing/exporting data as well as backing up/restoring c:geo\'s database. Other effects may occur. We recommend to not upgrade to Android 11 for the time being.

Map:

  • .

Cache details:

  • New: Allow negative bearing angles for waypoint projection
  • New: Voice output: Estimate device orientation and transform coords when mobile is upright
  • Fix: Offline log remembers selected image
  • New: Offline logging now supports adding multiple images

Cache lists:

  • .

Other:

  • New: Offer c:geo for navigation intents (eg.: from Lab Adventure app)
